lodash._reevaluate v3.0.1

The modern build of lodashâ€™s internal reEvaluate exported as a Node.js/io.js module.

Installation

Using npm:

$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.reevaluate

In Node.js/io.js:

var reEvaluate = require('lodash.reevaluate');

See the package source for more details.
